title: Shipping methods
columnsJson:
[{"id":"z1607239110054","column":"title","widget":"\Symfony\Component\Form\Extension\Core\Type\TextType","label":"Title:","field":"title","required":1,"unique":0,"sql":""},{"id":"z1625525206479","column":"extra2","widget":"\Symfony\Component\Form\Extension\Core\Type\ChoiceType","label":"Shipping country:","field":"country","required":0,"unique":0,"sql":"SELECT 
    t1.id AS `key`, t1.title AS value
FROM
    ShippingZone AS t1
WHERE
    t1.parentId IS NULL OR t1.parentId = ''
ORDER BY FIELD(value, 'Canada', 'United Kingdom (UK)', 'United States (US)', 'Australia', 'New Zealand') DESC, t1.title ASC"},{"id":"z1609475632817","column":"extra1","widget":"\Symfony\Component\Form\Extension\Core\Type\TextType","label":"Free shipping if order price is above than ($):","field":"freeDeliveryIfPriceAbove","required":0,"unique":0,"sql":""},{"id":"z1609471037549","column":"shortdescription","widget":"\MillenniumFalcon\Core\Form\Type\Wysiwyg","label":"Shipping method description (if required):","field":"shippingMethod","required":0,"unique":0,"sql":""},{"id":"z1607239373239","column":"content","widget":"\MillenniumFalcon\Core\Form\Type\ContentBlock","label":"Shipping cost rates:","field":"shippingCostRates","required":0,"unique":0,"sql":""}]
